EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2016-05-11-OpenStack Mitaka Webinar.EMAIL-Follow Up Missed
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You! Watch the OpenStack Mitaka: Updates From Release 13 Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}}, Sorry we missed you at our OpenStack Mitaka: Updates From Release 13 Webinar. We get it, things come up and days get busy. Fear not though, for there is a recording of the webinar that you can view at your leisure. You can find the recording here <[[http://vmturbo.com/thx-wbnr-rcrd-openstack-mitaka/]]> Please reach out to your account representative or our Evaluation Team <[[mailto: evalteam@vmturbo.com]]> if you have any questions!
-The VMTurbo Team
